sentence: Next on the agenda was Ohio, which Nir believes Democrats are unlikely to flip despite having a solid candidate in Congressman Tim Ryan.
title: David Nir on Michelangelo Signorile: 2022 elections, flipping the Senate, and the Trump factor

sentence: Democratic front-runner Tim Ryan would no doubt rather one of them prevail than Matt Dolan, the state senator and part owner of the Cleveland Guardians, who insists on talking about the issues.
title: Opinion: If Democrats get some easy midterm wins, they can thank Trump

title: Original ‘Trumpers’ urge ex-president to rescind Vance endorsement in Ohio Senate race
